title: Powerball Jackpot Rises to $1.9 Billion After No Winning Ticket Sold
description: No tickets matched all six numbers to win the top prize after the drawing Saturday night. The next drawing is Monday.
dc:creator: Amanda Holpuch and Johnny Diaz
media:description: The Powerball jackpot grew to $1.9 billion after the drawing Saturday night produced no top prize winner.
